bibl.title: The Word List P. Lund VI 11 (inv. 9): Re-edition and Commentary.
bibl.note: Re-edition of P. Lund VI, 11 (= Pack2 2744). Provenance unknown, third-fourth century AD. One can label the list as 'moral-religious'. Comparison with the images on the contemporary coins (divinities, personifications, etc.).
bibl.seg: BAPLU Nele, The Word List P. Lund VI 11 (inv. 9): Re-edition and Commentary.
ArchPF 52 (2006) pp. 14-30, 1 tabl. et pl. II.

Re-edition of P. Lund VI, 11 (= Pack2 2744). Provenance unknown, third-fourth century AD. One can label the list as 'moral-religious'. Comparison with the images on the contemporary coins (divinities, personifications, etc.).
